comments:
I haven't had a chance to track it down, but dropping a JInternalFrame on a
JDesktopPane causes exceptions to be logged in the .log file from the property
sheet. I will attach a .log for you to see.

The problem is due to commented out code in ImageIconLabelPRovider for getting
the icon. Property in this case was "frameIcon". The code was commented out
because it tries to go through the init string. The whole init string stuff is
on hold until bug 60199 is fixed so that we can use the parse tree to handle it.

Eugene, please have a look at this. This was broke back before we fixed the
parse tree allocation stuff for the ImagaIconCellEditor. It should now work but
still throws exceptions:

java.lang.NullPointerException

not reproducible since 15-06-2004 and jdk build 1306
Since this bug was not reOpened for more than a month, this bug is verified.
